entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º199,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º199,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools â€¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state â€¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage â€¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details â€¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running â€¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage â€¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space â€¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries â€¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance â€¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools â€¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed â€¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status â€¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses â€¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools â€¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options â€¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases â€¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats â€¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options â€¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools â€¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements â€¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies â€¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support â€¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status â€¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events â€¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks â€¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly â€¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition â€¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors â€¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app â€¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone â€¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session â€¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness â€¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup â€¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more â€¢ Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers â€” perfect for designers and creatives Highlights â€¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools â€¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities â€¢ No ads or in-app purchases â€¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient â€¢ Compatible with all iOS devices â€¢ Frequent updates with new tools â€¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind â€¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for â€¢ Device monitoring and optimization â€¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks â€¢ Scanning documents and QR codes â€¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts â€¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders â€¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters â€¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control â€¢ Performing simple network diagnostics â€¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy â€¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information â€¢ Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.title: Cyber Manhunt
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º249,99 â†’ â‚º149,99 [â‚º99,99 ~ â‚º249,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º149,99

In-App Purchases

  • Hello World!ï¼šâ‚º49,99
  • Home Sweet Homeï¼šâ‚º49,99

Application Description

Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches. [Contents] â—†Chapter I: Death of a Programmer The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying? â—†Chapter II: Invisible Eyes The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women? â—†Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim? â—†Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again! â—†Chapter V: Immortal Code When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality? â—†DLC: Home Sweet Home Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?! â—†DLC: Hello World! Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracyâ€¦ [Features] â—†Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents. â—†Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc.. â—†Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc... â—†Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself. â—†Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive. â—†Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio. [Gameplay] â—†Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search. â—†Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets. â—†Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms. â—†Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target. â—†Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information. â—†Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures. More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Cluedo
entry.summary:
Whispering Pines Bundle: â‚º699,99 â†’ â‚º249,99
Black Adder Resort Bundle: â‚º699,99 â†’ â‚º249,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Whispering Pines Bundleï¼šâ‚º699,99 â†’ â‚º249,99 [â‚º249,99 ~ â‚º699,99]
  • Black Adder Resort Bundleï¼šâ‚º699,99 â†’ â‚º249,99 [â‚º249,99 ~ â‚º699,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º34,99

In-App Purchases

  • Suspects Bundleï¼šâ‚º1.499,99
  • Ultimate Editionï¼šâ‚º1.999,99
  • PolarStation Crime SceneBundleï¼šâ‚º249,99
  • Whispering Pines Bundleï¼šâ‚º249,99
  • Black Adder Resort Bundleï¼šâ‚º249,99
  • Epic Crime Collection contentï¼šâ‚º999,99
  • Noir Character Packï¼šâ‚º399,99
  • Noir Crime Scene Plumï¼šâ‚º99,99
  • Noir Crime Scene Peacockï¼šâ‚º99,99
  • Noir Crime Scene Locationï¼šâ‚º249,99

Application Description

Join fellow detectives all over the world in the official digital board game version of Clue/Cluedo! Gather crucial evidence, interrogate suspects and solve the original murder mystery. Follow Miss Scarlett, Colonel Mustard, Professor Plum, Chef White, Solicitor Peacock and Mayor Green through the iconic Tudor Mansion, unlocking their motives and alibis as you go. Enjoy Clue/Cluedo the way you remember it in Classic Mode, or jump in for a quick game with Clue Cards mode. Alternatively, if you want to really test your sleuthing skills, try a new investigation format available exclusively to Clue/Cluedo â€“ Ultimate Detective. In Ultimate Detective Mode, everyone answers suggestions at the same timeâ€¦but secretly! Face your suspects in a direct interrogation as you rely on your skills of deduction to get to the truth. Experience the mystery, solve the murder and become a top-tier detective! HOW TO PLAY CLUE/CLUEDO: 1. Three cards are dealt face-down and set aside â€“ this is the solution to the crime! 2. Everyone is dealt three Clue Cards. These are automatically crossed off your clue sheet, as they canâ€™t be part of the solution. 3. Roll the dice and move around the board. 4. When you enter a room, you can make a suggestion â€“ select who you think the murderer is, what weapon they used and where the crime happened. 5. Other players will then aim to disprove your suggestion; if one of your suggestions matches a card in their hand, they show you that card to disprove it. 6. Use your clue sheet to keep track of which characters, weapons and rooms have been disproven. 7. Think youâ€™ve figured it out? Itâ€™s time to make an accusation! Be careful though â€“ if youâ€™re right, you win, but if you are wrong, youâ€™re out! FEATURES - THE CLASSIC TUDOR MANSION â€“ Play the beloved original board game, now rendered in stunning 3D animation and entirely ad-free! - A BRAND-NEW GAME MODE â€“ Exclusive to the digital version of Clue/Cluedo, Ultimate Detective Mode lets you interrogate multiple characters at once. - MULTIPLE MODES â€“ Compete against cutting-edge AI opponents that adapt to your skill level for the perfect game, or challenge detectives around the world. - ADDITIONAL ORIGINAL CONTENT â€“ What happened after the shocking events of Tudor Mansion? Find out in a series of original new crime scenes designed specifically for the digital version of Clue/Cluedo! New characters emerge, bringing with them new clues, motives and case files to consider as you travel around the world in search of the truth. Sharpen your mind with the iconic murder-mystery board game, now available on mobile!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Walden - Calendar/ToDo/Notes
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime Membershipï¼šâ‚º699,99 â†’ â‚º499,99 [â‚º349,99 ~ â‚º699,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Quarterly Membershipï¼šâ‚º129,99
  • Lifetime - Educationï¼šâ‚º499,99
  • å¹´åº¦ä¼šå‘˜å‡çº§ç»ˆèº«ä¼šå‘˜ï¼šâ‚º499,99
  • Yearly Membershipï¼šâ‚º179,99
  • Monthly Membershipï¼šâ‚º19,99
  • å¹´åº¦ä¼šå‘˜ï¼šâ‚º199,99
  • æœˆåº¦ä¼šå‘˜ï¼šâ‚º49,99
  • Lifetime Membershipï¼šâ‚º499,99

Application Description

Walden is an App focused on personal management, carefully designed to bring users only a quality experience, hope you like it. Function Introduction To-Do List Integrate the four quadrants of work, according to the priority of the task rational scheduling. Support repeat schedule and reminders. Pomodoro Walden's built-in tomato clock is designed strictly according to the tomato work method You can set daily tomato clock goals, rest time, and select the tasks to focus on from the to-do list Progress Management Quantify your goals, support goal grouping and progress notes, with a simple and beautiful progress bar, clearly track your goal progress. Flash Notes Integrate custom tags, support full-text search and display by tags. In our daily life, there will always be a moment of light and whimsy, it can be the emotion after reading a text, it can be the resonance of listening to a song, or simply want to record the moment's thoughts. If you are like me and want to practice writing long articles, then you can start by writing a paragraph every day and gradually improve your writing skills day by day. ----------------- Subscription Instructions --Subscription period: 1 month, 1 year (non-automatic renewal, please feel free to purchase) -- Payment: Payment will be deducted through the user's iTunes account, and payment will be made once the user confirms the purchase. --User Terms: http://freelancer-x.com/app-terms/ -- Privacy Policy: http://freelancer-x.com/app-privacy-policy/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Security Camera - Home Monitor
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º149,99 â†’ â‚º79,99 [â‚º79,99 ~ â‚º149,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º79,99

Application Description

With the Security Camera app, you can monitor your home by watching a live video stream on any other device connected to the same Wi-Fi network, using only a web browser. * This is a unique approach that many users appreciated * ** How it works: The app captures video, generates a live stream and runs an http web server. The app displays the web address or URL of the live stream page. The URL contains the IP address of the iPhone on which the app runs. All you need to do is just to open a web browser on your computer, another smartphone or tablet, navigate to the page and start watching. Internet connection is not required, only home Wi-Fi is used.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

Application Description

You wake up in an unknown place and the last thing you remember is being kidnapped. But something has happened in that strange place, something out of the ordinary ... something dangerous. You must discover the way to escape. Because here, you will only find death. -Explore a large dark area: secret buildings, a creepy hospital and mysterious laboratories. -Solve puzzles and search, collect and use objects to escape from the place. -Escape with your friends in online multiplayer mode! (Alpha) INCLUDES: -New map: Forest -Create unlimited private multiplayer rooms -No ads
